original_text: And the young man who told him said, “By chance I happened to be on Mount Gilboa, and there was Saul leaning on his spear, and behold, the chariots and the horsemen were close upon him.
korean_text: 그에게 알리는 청년이 이르되 내가 우연히 길보아 산에 올라가 보니 사울이 자기 창에 기대고 병거와 기병은 그를 급히 따르는데

sentences.original_text: And the young man who told him said
By chance I happened to be on Mount Gilboa
and there was Saul leaning on his spear
and behold, the chariots and the horsemen were close upon him
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 병거들과 기병들이 그에게 가까이 왔더라
